name: rbw-claude-code
description: Python development and productivity plugins for Claude Code

metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for Python development workflows including AI-powered code review, workflow automation, poetry enforcement, conventional commits, auto-formatting, type checking, and test reminders.

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Universal AI-powered development tools: 22 agents, 17 commands, 13 skills for code review, research, and workflow automation

plugins.name: python-backend
plugins.description: Python-specific tools: 7 agents, 2 commands, 1 skill for Python code review, testing, and type checking

plugins.name: enforce-uv
plugins.description: Block bare python/pip/pytest commands, enforce uv usage

plugins.name: conventional-commits
plugins.description: Validate git commit messages follow conventional format

plugins.name: gemini-model-guard
plugins.description: Block Gemini 2.x models, enforce Gemini 3 models only

plugins.name: python-format
plugins.description: Auto-format Python files with ruff after edits

plugins.name: python-typecheck
plugins.description: Run type checking after Python file edits

plugins.name: test-reminder
plugins.description: Remind to add tests when creating new Python files

plugins.name: clean-code-guard
plugins.description: Block messy patterns (python -c, heredocs), nudge toward clean alternatives

plugins.name: safety-guard
plugins.description: Block destructive file operations, env file reading, and supply chain attacks

plugins.name: git-safety-guard
plugins.description: Block destructive git commands to prevent data loss

plugins.name: gh-api-guard
plugins.description: Allow only safe read-only gh api commands

plugins.name: protect-env
plugins.description: Prevent reading .env files to protect secrets
